description: As soon as the weather starts to warm up, we start craving light, stimulating, and fruit-forward cocktails.&nbsp;Pineapple Rosemary Crush is the perfect summer sipping drink because it combines fresh pineapple chunks and herbaceous rosemary with&nbsp;ginger ale and&nbsp;sparkling wine.The result is a fruity and slightly sweet drink, with a slight bitterness from the ginger ale that helps balance out the sweetness.We also love the fact that this cocktail can be easily adapted to whatever fruit is in season. So whether you're using fresh strawberries, blueberries, or even mango, Pineapple Rosemary Crush is always a winner.
name: Pineapple Rosemary Crush
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Fresh pineapple chunks or fruit of choice

recipeInstructions.name: In the bottom of a cocktail glass, muddle two pineapple chunks and a small sprig of rosemary.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off with sparkling wine and ginger ale.
